name: Night Drive VR
description: Select your playlist and drive a flying car through a sci-fi city
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 x64 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 900 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10  x64 Processor: Intel i7-4790 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX980 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 900 MB available space
